member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros
member.summary: Declares placeholders for custom harness templates. Implementation is based on Chutzpah: https://chutzpah.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=customizabletestharness

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.ReferencedCssFiles
member.summary: Specifies CSS-files. Replaces with collection of 'link' HTML-tags.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestFrameworkDependencies
member.summary: Specifies test framework JS-files (Jasmine, QUnit etc).

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.ReferencedJsFiles
member.summary: Specifies test file's dependencies. Replaces with 'script' HTML-tags.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.ReSharperIntegration
member.summary: Specifies JS-scripts to integrate test framework with ReSharper's Test Runner.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestNames
member.summary: Specifies test names. Replaces with "test1", "test2", "test3" etc.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.SolutionDir
member.summary: Specifies solution directory as local path without trailing backslash.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.ProjectDir
member.summary: Specifies test file's project directory as local path without trailing backslash.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestFileDir
member.summary: Specifies test file's directory as local path without trailing backslash.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestFileProjectDir
member.summary: Specifies test file's relative path starting with project directory without trailing backslash. Path starts with '/' which represents project-based path.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestFileSolutionDir
member.summary: Specifies test file's relative path starting with solution directory without trailing backslash. Path starts with '~/' which represents solution-based path.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestFileFullName
member.summary: Specifies test file's full path.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestFileName
member.summary: Specifies test file's name.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.TestFileNameWithoutExtension
member.summary: Specifies test file's name.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Harness.Macros.ReSharperMessage
member.summary: Message to show user ReSharper's error info etc.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Html.IHtmlDocument.AllLinkTags
member.summary: Returns all 'link' tags found in document

member.summary: Parses input HTML-code.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.UnitTestRunner.JavaScript.Html.SimpleHtmlParser
member.summary: Implements HTML-parser for parsing 'script' and 'link' tags with attributes. This implementation is for JavaScript test-harness support only.
